post.body: oh, btw, Nola misses you and sez you MUST visit SOON! :)
well, it was "5 o'clock" at 9 am for me...2 frozen irish coffees at Molly's! :)
I think you can carry anything off! :) I am about to hit the streets. gonna go 2 some artist coops then mag st.
it was wretched...I feel badly if some1 was hurt/killed.
heck yeah!!! :)
do NOT nom de kiddenz...LOL!
Ah! I knew I saw it last year - meh, I figured I wouldn't be a contendah, but wanted to throw it out there...LOL
Okay, here's my submish...but as a late entry, I understand if I don't qualify. http://tinyurl.com/37uqy5
and folks wanted HIM for pres? President Maalox Moment...
are THOSE those weird tubby moths I saw all over the place this weekend? fuzzy red 'butt', kind of aimless...(the moth, not me).
I say, throw a whole Payless at 'im!!!
WTF? Um, don't they have 'our'(taxpayers) $700B that they should be WORKING w/and not spa-ing with???
ooh not bad... Of course I will always bare my neck for Rice's Louis. But young Edward is just so...'licious.
ooh, must check that out. :) "fangs" for that reference. LOL
hee hee. Hey, I read 'twilight' last week and LOVED it. I wouldn't mind meeting an Edward Cullen of my own. *deep sigh*
OMG! I'm LOL'g! there's a ring ad w/a honker stone, band inscribed: how's this for communication? - srsly!
club dream on Decatur. Saw the headline on nola.com a few secs ago.
done! :)
thx! was accostd by culter @ hair dressers day of Victoria's verdict. I was appalled by othr lady's GLOAT,GREED & ARROGANCE.
I hear ya!
OH HECK YEAH! Xmas Wrapping!!! I LOVE that song! "You forgot cranberries, too?" = epic win! :)
"do they know it's xmas" by gr8 UK bands still takes me back. :)
Jimmy Buffett's "xmas island" cd has some gr8 tunes. also have an 80s xmas cd. :)
that goes 4 any breed of dog's owners! dnstrs neighb's GSD is obnox, othr neighbs horny dachsy is embarr - I blame the humans.
yay, gotta bolt, I hear my ravens caw-ing for me to get back out & about. :)
any austin peeps willing to put up a crazy cake artist for 2 nts Feb 28/Mar 1? :) I just need counter space Fri nt. :)
Oh, and GOT CARDED at Molly's! I tipped her well after that! LOL! :)
about to change clothes & berets & finally get to streetcar. mebbe camellia grille? or is Roma still near Mag St.?
I bought a mask & lots of giftage. Brad & Ginger at Attala Art r cool! Santa's Qtrs gave me 20% off. Lagniappe = EPIC WIN! :)
I have seen 4 ravens thus far. 2 flying towards the lake and 1 chasing another one w/a furfur! :) low squawks like "hey, share!?" LOL!
okay, off 2 ramble n FQ, then Mag St! :) I'm in a houndstooth beret & NIN "with teeth" hoodie. Say hello! :) no twitt on phone sadly.
Am about to shut down for night myself. Snow/ice/traffic/getting here/doing stuff - am 'wore to a frazzle'! :)
stoopit bears! :( grrrrr! I still love da Saints! I wore my FYYFF shirt to Celeb in Oax. :)
I am bummed I missed seeing the snow IN the area... :( the pix on news of FQ blanketed...wow! totally missed it...sniff
so, any Y'ats in da city, lemme know! :) let's hang? :)
went 2 Celeb/Oaks w/BnB proprietress & anothr guest! then Liuzza's on bienville 4 dinner & Brocato's 4 dessert! :) = Epic WIN
but there was a fatality/wreck @1-10 & Thompsn :( aftr that, it was plain sailing. I crossed da border @1:11! parked @4:45 @ bnb! :)
on I-10 just b4 10 am, fine until just away from Hou. spent TWO hours to get not evn 20mi away! weather was fantastic...(see nxt twitt)
woke up 5 am, saw news, saw wrex, saw idjits on road. got tickd & went bk 2 sleep 4 anthr hour. woke up, showrd, loaded, rolled @ 9:45 am
oh dear - http://tinyurl.com/57s9rj
having faux-Nola food - Pappadeaux' crawfish bisque & bread pudding for dessert...sigh...
& since most of the guys I have dated turned out to suck, at least a vamp would be up front about it...! LOL!
yeah, why bother trying to talk to her like she's a human fellas...just shut her up w/a stone. criminy. thx diamond cartel, really. NOT
just realized, next paycheck is kinda 'free', as the following one still hits in time for rent check. dare I come back to Nola? LOL
and I left my coat at home...d'oh!!! Bother. Maitri - gonna need to whip up some of that hot buttrd rum. That was divine!
It's all good - I never sent any last year, just bought a few types!!! LOL
trying to suss out just who deserves a New Orleans' themed holiday card...and who gets leftovers from last year? LOL!
Houston Ballet is doing Swan Lake this season (June I believe). Memories of being a kid & watching my Aunt as Odette. sigh...
Nutcracker was nice. But I'm a snob, my Aunt was the BEST SPF EVERRRR!!! Not to mention her fellow dancers back then. :)
OK chkg dryer load, better b done. I have an hour 2 b @ frnd's house 2 go 2 matinee of The Nutcracker! :)
RT@WetBankGuy http://savethebonfire.blogspot.com/ any twit'rs that LOVE NOLA (evn if u dn't live there) please RT! Peace.
my hairdresser is da bomb. :)
'culter' = osteen congregant, didn't want y'all to think I misspelled 'cutter'.
& their cult is of the "give $$ so u rec'v $$!", like an xtian pyramid scheme. Jeebus was poor of pocket, rich in humanity. Baby jc weeps.
they fly FIRST EFF'G CLASS, drive $$$$$$$ cars, what do THEY know about tuff econ times? their sheeple will keep them in clover.
they r 2 talk abt 'getting thru these tough econ times'? THEY LIVE IN A MEGABUX Manse owned by the cult, er, 'church'.
Oh, for feck's sake - the Osteen-tatious 'preacher couple' are on Larry King later...WTF???
okay, MUST do laundry, I have the matinee perf of "The Nutcracker" to be ready for! :)
watching 'growing up wolf' on animal planet. baby wolf howl = better than baby hooman! :) (2 me anyway)
Oh, I enjoyed "twilight" - they didn't make guys that good looking (let alone that were vampires) when I was in high school...bother!
